content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a friends house and i noticed what looked like lightning flashes in the sky above my car.  i stopped and got out to get a better look and at the same time the whole night sky lit up in a bluish color and i saw something burning followed by these large orange sparks falling from behind the objects path.  it all was followed by a large boom and disappeared.  i thought maybe it looked a little bit like a flare but only the sparks and i myself have shot flares in the past while in the coast guard and none of them ever flew and reacted like the object i saw just then.  when i got home a friend confirmed that he heard the boom and that it shook his house. his son saw the sky flashing and now i see that the news channels have reported it on the 11oclock news as treir top story.  it may have been a meteorite but who knows for sure.  all i know is that it was pretty exciting to witness and be a part of.
content.summary: Blue flash of light followed by orange sparks.

content.detailedDescription: Fue visto por mi hijo y lo reconocio como estrella fugaz pero al interrogarlo para identificar donde fue que la habia visto pudimos observarlo cinco personas presentes como con velocidad fuera de lo normal visto como cualquier avion se desplazo por unos segundos y luego a la vista de todos en un recorrido recto desaparecio...
content.summary: Velocidad estable muy rapida y luego desaparece.

content.detailedDescription:
I received this report via e-mail from mr. krusee.  i had prior contact with him when he filed a ufo report with mufon in 2007.

in his e-mail, he stated that at 1740 hours on 3-8-2009, he saw a cigar-shaped object fly in a straight course from east to west over the distant wooded hills.

he described the craft as follows: "it was not the typical fat stogie-like cigar shape, but rather a long silver colored tube with edges rounded in front and back.  i could also barely make out two small blotches of red at even distances from the front and back."

i am attempting further contact with mr. krusee for an in-depth interview.
content.summary: Watched a cigar-shaped object fly from east to west.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was on waugh chapel rd., driving home.

2. a bright light in the sky made me notice the object.

3. when i first saw the object i thought it was a missle of some sort, but it was far too small to be a missle.

4. the object was a fireball about the size of a baseball/volleyball and it was very bright with a green flare trailing behind. it was falling straight down to earth at a very high speed. 

5. at first i was very concerned that maybe it was a weapon of some sort and was intially expecting detonation of some sort. i drove toward the area i thought the object impacted. i was unable to find it or any signs of where it landed. also, i was unable to take any pictuers or video of this because i didn't have a camera on hand and even if i did there would not have been enough time since it was moving so fast.

6. i lost sight by the object falling to fast for me to keep up with.
content.summary: Baseball-sized fireball with a bright green flare.

content.detailedDescription: There is nothing more to say.  i have wonderful details, shapes, colors, and pulsaions that you would not beliueve.  i still find it hard.  howevee, anyone that i have shoed the tape to, now believes.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Circle,  Cylinder,  Disc,  Fireball,  Sphere,  Star-like,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: I have witnessed & taped over 7 hours of a u.F o. over the last month.........

content.detailedDescription: While re-fueling car, someone said, what the hell is that? overhead was a huge shiny,"alumin foil" shiny triangle just motionless, and silent. my father and i watched ,along with others for about 10 min., then proceeded on our way to california. as my father drove, i hung my head out the window, and continued watching the object until it seemed to rise ever so slowly until it appeared to be just another star in the night sky. we were both in awe of the sighting, and my father, an ex cdn. air force man, told me we'd just seen a u.F.O.
content.summary: Above gas station, hovering at approx. 200ft., multiple witnesses.

content.detailedDescription: Five or 4 lights withe color) aways on on vertical, the movimento of object is very slow, see on 26��� 53' s, 49��� 04' w, going to nw.
content.summary: Five or 4 lights (withe color) on vertical.

content.detailedDescription: It was aprox. 9-10pm. i was looking outside while i was on my laptop, and saw an airliner with usual path, then a lot higher was this other blinking slower and moving slower than an airplane, object.I grabbed my bincoluars,and watched it move east from west and im not sure if it was rotating- as i had thought, but i was sure it was a rounded object with 3 lights, 2 blinking 1 red, 1 green. as i was trying to follow it, it was zipping back and forth so quick  that if i had not propped the binoculars (as i moved to the other bigger window to follow it at this point) it would had probably not looked like it was zipping back and forth to anyone else. anyways, i wasn't going to report it because i see these government and what not operated objects very often.I just wanted to bring some relief to the other person in oh wherever they live that i saw something similar as well.My case worker is connie mcnichols. i'm not concerned if i hear from mufon or not, like i said, i see these things so often it gets annoying.If anyone else from oh see's these things, and wants to seriously talk, my email is jenbobsquarepants83@yahoo.Com.
content.summary: Saw  a disc object flying over tree tops, rotating around area, not in same path as airplane, had blinking lights, moving very slow and erratic.Watched with binoculars-(10x50 288 ft. at 1000 yds,96m at 1000m).Only reporting because i'm sure of what i saw.

content.detailedDescription:
at around 3am i happened to look out my second story window and saw unusual lights in the sky to the east of my location. at first i thought it was a microwave tower that stands about a mile away, but then i noticed that the light on the tower was to the right of the lights i was seeing. the tower light is white and blinks around 40 times per minute. the lights i saw seemed to be rotating around on a horizontal axis and were red and green in color. they were similar to 'chaser lights' and were blinking at about 120 times per minute. at first i believed that the lighted object was hovering just above i-75 which runs north and south about a mile away. however, as i watched, the object slowly descended behind the hills some distance past the interstate. i did not see the object again. moments later, a small plane passed overhead from west to east over my home and in the direction of where i had seen the object. i then watched the plane until it passed out of sight and saw nothing more.

     later in the day, i was able to eliminate other factors. the light from the microwave tower is clearly farther south than the lights i saw and it has only one white light. from the back of my home it is possible to sometimes see headlights on the interstate, but the object i saw was clearly high in the sky. this was not an airplane. this object hovered for a minute or more before descending. as best as i can tell, the object made no sound as i had my window open and could clearly hear cars on the highway but nothing else. 

     i don't mind saying that this has me a bit rattled. i know people who have seen unidentified objects and i do believe they exist, but this was the first time i have witnessed one myself. i considered reporting this to the local authorities, but decided to wait and see if there were any other reports that made the papers or local news. having seen and heard nothing, my boyfriend suggested mufon as he is familiar with the group and believes that my report will be taken seriously. thank you.
content.summary: I witnessed what appeared to be a disc shaped craft with lights rotating around the perimeter.

content.detailedDescription:
I was testing my camera in combination with 15x binoculars fitted with
solar filters, and decided to photograph the sun , even though there was
considerable overcast. i took a number of shots of the solar disk. when
i downloaded the images, one of them exhibited an oblong white spot. i
assumed at first that i was seeing some sort of optical artifact or
aberration , but none of the other photos, all taken within minutes of
this one, showed anything unusual. upon closer inspection, i realized
that the white spot had dimensionality. the upper portion of the image
is quite light. there must be significance to this brightness; the solar
filters i was using reduce the incoming sun light by a large factor, ten
thousand times if i am not mistaken ! then, there is the underside of the
image to consider. to me , it is obviously in shadow, and it is also 
apparent that this object is wingless. i am still in awe of the chances
that i happened to be imaging the sun at what looks to be the very time
that this craft was in position. this sighting took place from my front
yard in oak forest, illinois.
content.summary: Captured ufo in front of sun using optics protected with solar filters.

content.detailedDescription: Many mornings i wake up around 4:00 am and if i can't fall back to sleep i love to look out of my balcony window if it is a clear night. i just take a chair and sit in front of my balcony window and look into the clear night sky. i have always been fascinated with the stars and love to just look into the early morning sky in hopes of catching a glimpse of a shooting star. this happend somewhere between 5:45 am to 6:30 am over downtown minneapolis. after sitting and looking into the sky i noticed a beautifu v formation of birds, these birds were unlike any other that i have seen they were high up and i told my daughter that they seemed to glow against the dark sky. they weren't like i normally see 7 or 8 geese in a v formation, this was like they were maybe 10 to 15 birds on each side and flying in a tight v formation, it was so beautiful, it was soon after that when i shifted my gaze to the right and saw this flash of fire/light.It looked so different from any other meteor, comet or shooting star that i had ever seen. it maybe looked similar to a shooting star but the ones that i have always seen seem to shoot across the sky and look far away, not straight down and close by. this one looked like it happened just above this bldg. which was the united state court house, which is about three blocks away from where i live. it didn't have any beginning to it that i saw. it didn't land, it was a long flash of light just above the bldg. i felt that it was so close by like if someone shot a flare into the sky or like a firework went off only in a straight line of light. it wasn't a beam of light it was more fire like. i was amazed at how close it looked to my condo and i just happened to be looking in that direction at the time. i kept thinking of what it might be for most of the day, so i decided to go out and walk around that area. they are doing lots of road construction work around are area. i didn't see anything that caught my attention except for one large rock that looked a little different from some of the surrounding rocks but didn't think it had anything to do with what i saw. hope this is information might prove helpful in some way.
content.summary: It looked like it could have been meteorite debris, but since i don't know what it was i thought to report it here.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from work and arrived home to see an orange orb the size of a small shed it looked as if something was inside, it moving around,it was glowing and i was astonished to actually see it so close i shut the jeep down and sat and observed it seemed to hover for such along time between the two tree tops..Then it moved up and away across the street easterly low flying...I went into the house where my son was sleeping on the couch in front of a television and he wanted me to stay up to finsh the movie , he is 25 and also works nights but was on days off at the time i had finally went to bed about 4:30 am and just about dusk my son awoke me and said his arm was burning and asked me to look at it...He had 3 marks like pods that were raised in the shape of a triangle during the course of the week it hurt and it was hard to prevent him from scratching it till it bled i kept telling him to leave it alone it finally disappeared, i had to calm him down a little and tell him this is common as i had one and sightings too in the course of the next few months my daughter which had the same triangle on her during her pregnancy in ft. morgan, co. in nov.3,2005 this was the birth of my grandson, and nov.14th 2008 he had a dark triangle on his hand... and i pointed this out to his mom...Since then i had witnessed the orange orb following me home from ft. collins, co. about 1:45 am when i leave the redman dr. to hwy 14 west to timberline south to hwy392 west to hwy 287south to get home they seem to follow at a distance sometimes not always...This is ok with me as i have had contact with triangular craft and have had amissing fetus in 1991 with at least two beings in my house in the ft. moran colorado area...I am from trumbull, connecticut and have notice alot of reports in that area too. thanks for letting me report this i am truthful with this report...For some reason i draw the marks and implant sights all thru the years and the dates and the drawings ,but have always distroyed them...I didn't know whom to give them too
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orange orb large over treeline between two trees in front of driveway.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness jack burke (hereafter burke) provides:

"my wife and daughter were yelling that i need to go out and see this.  i had just got in bed.  i ran outside and was so amazed by what i saw i came back in the house, got dressed, and went out on the back deck.  there were four (4) very bright lights in a stationary position.  they started to spin in a circular motion.  one light went out, a third started to flicker and went out.  i called the next-door neighbor to make sure someone else from another household saw what we were seeing.  the neighbor saw the two (2) lights and then they both went out.  i'm not really a believer of this stuff, but this really freaked me out.  the area it was in is a state park with a large lake; very woody and quiet.  the other freaky thing is...We could see the lights and the motion of the lights but we took pictures and you could see the lights when i took the picture but nothing is on the memory stick. same with the video camera.  we could see the lights through the camera but the video is black."
content.summary: Four bright revolving lights in the sky remained stationary and then "blinked" out.

content.detailedDescription:
I prefer to elaborate on details of what i witnessed to a person rather than this written account...But here is a briefing:

it was some time ago, and i hope in writing this...Mufon might confirm my story with other accounts that have been reported in relative time & event description.
also, let me preface my account with the fact of my account is based soley on my memory.  i have no photographic evidence, and no written notes.  i am a 35-year old (professionaly employed) male with some piloting experience.  i also have never been treated for any sort of mental or psychological impairment.  i do not use drugs or alcohol (never have, never will)  ...That being said, here is my story:

i estimate the date was (approx.) 1993, i was about 19-years old at the time.  i observed a very bright light hovering in the area of ne philadelphia, near the northeast airport.  my attention was immediately drawn to this light over other lights in the area because iof it being much brighter than the rest in comparison.  i continued to watch the bright light for approx. 5 minutes before watching is ascend higher into the sky.  it appeared to me that the aircraft was only at about 3,000 feet in altitude.  the aircraft rose in a perfectly straight vertical ascension above everything else in sight.  after it's ascension, the aircraft appeared to stay hovering once again in the same spot for a few moments before moving directly towards me (i was in the 3rd floor bedroom of the house i grew up in) traveling in a eastbound direction.  as the aircraft approached, i had a much better look at it.  it was directly overhead of me.  i had a clear vision of the aircraft - a very large disc shaped object with a single bright light in the center & a lit outer edge.  it appeared that the aircraft was as large as a football field (or maybe the size of the entire street i was on).  it had no propellers, and it had no wings.  as the aircraft passed overhead and continued to travel in an eastbound direction, it diverted it's course to a southbound/upward direction - in an extremely fast menner (i would best describe the way it left was like watching a rubber-band being flung across a room).

i immediately phoned my father (who was at work as a police officer) to tell what i saw.  my father suggested that i call the northeast airport and ask if they had any information.  well, to my dismay, i don't think that the northeast airport took me seriously...Because they asked ignorant questions like, "was the ufo operated by little green men too, sir?"
again, i phoned my father and told him that the northeast airport had nopthing to offer.  next, he suggested that i call 9-1-1.  i did.  the 9-1-1 operator told me that there was nothing they could do...But my call was "the 10th call in the past minute about this".  9-1-1 also gave me a phone number to a ufo-hotline.  i called the number the naxt day, but never followed up with any more interviews or comments because i didn't want to waste my time telling this story to some "science-fiction" enthusiast who might be eager to believe anything & everything about ufo's.


...As you can see, i am cautious when telling this story because of the mixed reactions i might get.  i am simply writing this because i am sick of people discounting the fact that there might be something else out there, and sick of cover-ups, etc.  i hope that this letter makes it's way to someone else who saw what i did.  maybe there is someone else who has reported this (or who has yet to be interviewed) that can cooberrate my account.

...Too bad cell phones, videocameras, & other cool technology wasn't at our ready back then, huh?

i am available via email or phone call for future discussion.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright lit disc shaped object in the air.

content.detailedDescription:
Please recontact me!!!  you contacted my mother in corvallis, oregon. last summer 2008 towards summers end,  i was unavalibe due to work schedule however she informed me that someone from "mufon" had called her in regards to a written  statement that i had provided earlier that year or the year before, i still want to discuse this matter for i need to know if i am the only one tat had reported this sighting!!! this has changed my life, my experience alone has even greater apperciation for the the lost knowledge of mankind and his inability to reconize the vastness of our universe we live in- " i state. we are not alone"
please contact me again whoever it was that called for me last year an spoke to my mother <name removed> in corvallis,oregon. my number that i may be reached on is (xxx)xxx-xxxx cell#.
<witness digital signature removed>

<pid> - 03/28/09 - 15:26 cdt - djw
content.summary: Summerfest 1996 marucs ampitheater/ unbeliveable!!!!

content.detailedDescription:
I put my work uniforms in the trunk of my car on friday and i needed a uniform for work in the morning so i went to my car to get one. i was walking back into my house when i noticed the strobing lights. i wouldn't have noticed it if it wasn't for the number of lights and their relative brightness to anything else i usually see in the sky. i first thought that it might be a helicopter because i live three blocks from a hospital with a helipad and because it seemed to be fairly still in the sky. i watched for a minute or so listening for the sound of the helicopter (it's is very obvious when one flies over because it is loud). there wasn't even the faint sound of a plane - that i could tell. it started to move away to the south-by-southeast. it was maybe three times the height of an oak tree over the tree line. it seemed to elevate slightly as it went away. i lost sight of it when it went behind the tree line. i can't say for certain that it was anything unusual, just something i can't explain. their were maybe 3 - 5 lights that were mirrored along two lines that were angled up to a point where there was one bright slow strobing light ( the angle was probably 5 degrees. the one bright light at the meeting point of the lights that caught my eye was a whitish light. the ones going slightly down and away were yellowish (fast strobing) and the ones on the ends were deep red (not strobing). the lights never seemed to changes position relative to one another: so, i thought it might be one fixed object. i was completely sober and awake when i witnessed the lights. i didn't tell my wife until three days agao - i thought she'd think i lost my mind, she was actually a little disappointed that i didn't come get her, i told her i didn't want to miss anything.  i don't want to be contacted and i'd like to remain anonymous.
thank you. you can email me if you need any other information - although i think i've given you everything i have. if i could pinpoint it's exact location when i first saw the lights it would be at south "b" street and 11th street.
the photo is from exactly where i was standing. although it was actually in the evening and i opened the photo with paint so i could give a rendering of where the lights were and the relative size. i didn't see an object, only lights. the picture isn't depicting and actual event of any sort it is for reference only.
content.summary: It  appeared to be very large (two to three times the length of a bus) and low flying.

content.detailedDescription:
There is nothing really to decribe as the object only appeared on jpeg image on download. we saw nothing at time photograph taken.

walking for exercise up a city road to the north of kingston, jamaica, at 6.10 am or nearly that time, we stopped to take phtographs of the city behind us as the site was about 500 ft higher than the city. we took several and then went home after the exercise walk. we walk there very couple of days.

on downloading the pix into a pc, we saw what appeared to be a small disc-shaped object in the upper right hand quadrant of one of the  five images we took. we cannot identify the object. it appears to be about one half mile or so away from the camera and over some trees. it is exactly in front of the olympus fe 115 digital camera. like most small consumer digitals this has a small  infra-red focusser beam which would have been pointing directly at the object. i would appreciate some information on what your team thinks this object might be. thank you. dr. karl aiken.
content.summary: Object found only on download into computer.

content.detailedDescription:
On around about 22:30 hours=10:30pm a sighting over u.S.Government property or secure government areas in western missouri and kansas.Greater kansas city areas u.S.Military personnel had a strange phenomenon sighting a ball shaped object in the skies area military area and this was reported to me.This object was about 3,000 feet in the air and some personnel stated that it was about 200 feet in air .Also this object was moving slowly about 20 mph and it was glowing gold color this object was about the size of a car or a compact car others stated and other personnel stated it was a car and gave no size.Also this object caused no-electrical black-outs in the areas of kansas city, missouri or kansas city,kansas, no problems with radio or television commuications systems in area.Because out of fear going to prison some military personnel want to stay(anonymous) because of the $20,000.00 fine or 15 years in prison or both. / james allen tutt , jr -mufon field investigator .I.D.# 7606 ---- http://jamestu.Blog-city.Com/   
             
               also made no-sound--------------------
content.summary: A round object about the size of a house 3,000 feet in sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My cell phone charger had broke and i was driving southbound on route ninety five.  i looked to the east and noticed a fairly good sized cloud.  to the east of the cloud there was a contrail that had begun to be dispsersed by the wind.  in between these two points of reference and low down towards the horizon there was a shiny triangle, just sitting there not moving just sitting there.  as i continued to drive i kept my eye on it, i went behind a bend in the highway and when i could see it again, the triangle was now about halfway up the vertical length of the cloud and it had left a contrail.  at this point i pulled over to the side of the highway and got out of my truck with my binoculars.  i rested my elbows on my tool box and trained the binoculars on the object.  when i had got it into focus the object looked like it was made of a shiny angular(square) frame.  it still looked like a traingle but inside the triangle there was three circles that looked like very big halogen lights.  i work in a winery and we have four halogen lights that are about a foot in diameter with a kind of cage around them that is what it reminded me of.  i kept the binoculars on in it for a few minutes, but the binoculars aren't very high powered so what i just wrote is  basically all that i saw.  upon reflection i think it could have been in the shape of a pyramid.  after a few minutes i checked my watch and was going to be late for work so i packed it in, no one else on the road seemed to notice. 

 i had also seen four craft similar to these about three and a half years ago.  i was driving down route three at around the same time,three or four in the afternoon i was wearing shorts at the the time so i think it was in june or july of two thousand seven.  i was heading in a south westerly direction along the same route as ninety five i was in rhode island this time, around the exeter/coventry area.  i looked up in the western sky and saw three shiny triangles in a traingle formation.  as i followed the road they would move in and out of my line of sight, well they weren't moving i mean my sight of them was periodically obstructed over about a fifteen minute period.  for the last five minutes of sight i observed a fourth object that looked identical to the others a little to the west and higher in the sky from the position of the original formation that i saw.  i didn't have the binoculars at the time so i didn't pull over.



also not to cram so much in here but i have three more quick stories to relate about a different type of object.

 
as i said i work at a winery in stonington connecticut.  in the summer my job includes hedging the rows, this is basically walking up and down the rows and trimming the tops of the plants once they have grown over the top guide wires.  being that the vineyard is a wide open space it affords a veru clear view of the air traffic, we are close to the coast so we get a lot of coast guard planes, as well as larger c 130s from the military base in quonsett point rhode island, so i am no stranger to seeing planes and blimps, but they always have wings that are usually visible even at high altitudes.  well it was probably in july mid july a tuesday around two thirty because i had just decided to knock off and walk in.  i turned north to star walking up the hill and i saw it. it was moving swiftly towards the east.  at first i thought it was the coast guard cargo plane, but it was much bigger, and it  had no wings. the way i first described it was like a large propane tank, a hundred feet, maybe twice that, laid on its side.  it was all white except for a red stripe about one third the way up it from the back end, it was moving at a very fast rate exiting my line of sight before i could cover about fifty feet.  at first i thought it might be  a blimp, but the top and bottom were flat and only the two ends were rounded, later i heard someone describe something that they had seen as like a tylenol caplet, which is also a good description as far as i'm concerned.  also if it was a blimp i would think that the sponsor's name would so up clearly on it.  i mentioned it to a couple people and they thought i had seen the hood milk blimp i went on the internet and searched for pictures of it and found quite  a few, but these were obviously blimps, bulging out in all directions and no staight lines except on the pilot house.  again the object i saw looked like the top and bottom were as straight as an arrow.

i had two other sighting of the same object over the next four days, two days later i saw it again from the vineyard heading in the same easterly direction at roughly the same time.  and then on saturday of that smae week my fiance and i were heading north on ninety five around exit six in ri it passed again heading east.  both my fiance and i saw it that time and she says she didn't see any wings either, but she isn't sure that it wasn't a blimp of some sort.

these ar ethe experiences i've had and i would just like to pass them on to you hoping you can use them to further the case for disclosure.  if i can be of any help you are welcome to contact me.  i heard on coast to coast that you are skeptical about multiple sightings, but it is what it is, hope you can use my information.


james
content.summary: Distant: shiny triangle, binoculars: square framed with what looked like threee really bright halogen lights underneath.

content.detailedDescription:
In the middle of the night (1 or 2 am) my three dogs started barking hysterically in the room next to us.  my husband woke up and checked out the house.  nothing appeared to be wrong so we went back to bed. we drifted off to sleep seconds later. about 5 minutes later i woke up and looked directly ahead of me. something in me knew that there was something in front of me.  as i looked, my master bathroom was lit up with a strange smokey blue light.  i could see every detail in the bathroom.  as i started to focus, the light immediately dimmed to darkness. it was as if whatever was lighting up the room knew that i was looking and was spooked off.

why were my dogs barking?  did they know something was there that shouldn't have been?

i was scared and spooked.  i put my head under the covers and didn't dare to look up again.
content.summary: Strange blue light shining down in bathroom.

content.detailedDescription: My buddy and i just finished up a surf session, we were hosing the sand off of us outside my house ( i lived across the street from the beach) when we heard the huntington beach police helicopter coming overhead and it was rather unusual in that it was quite loud as it was very low maybe 500 ft. and to our surprise it was in hot pursuit of a small,dull metallic object. we both were employed at boeing long beach and are quite familiar with aircraft. my yearly physical confirmed my good eyesight as 20/17 at the time.  we went through a checklist right away and confirmed no beacons,wings,or propulsion units of any kind, however we could easily see the details of the helicopter. we also could not detect any sound at all from the object. it was about 10 ft. in diameter or so and a bronze color and somewhat weathered. it performed some zig-zag moves that were very impressive! the 'copter just couldn't keep up with it at all. it gave me the willys as it flew around the electrical plant a few times then shot off inland and out of sight! this all lasted about 20 seconds so no chance to take a picture. i thought about running inside and getting my camcorder but i sensed it would be over shortly and it was. i really wish i could have videoed it because it would have been proof that something is going on. i did yell for my girlfriend to come out but she didn't. her loss. i got a really strange feeling like the hairs standing up on the back of your neck thing. whatever was occupying the sphere had to be tiny or maybe it was remote controlled? some time later(years actually)i happened to come across a police pilot who was relatively new and i asked him about that incident and to my surprise he said " oh yeah i heard about that- it was picked up on costa mesa radar." (john wayne airport?).He then seemed to realize that maybe he wasn't supposed to talk about that and excused himself! anyway, that's my only ufo story that i had a witness to and was solid. i've seen some other things but were too vague like distant lights etc. but just weren't as close and visible as this. i was a skeptic but now believe something is going on. i really burn to know who they are and what they want. it is my belief that they are super intelligent and are not hostile but why are we chasing them? are they just playing with us? i really believe that something is going to happen soon, i just hope it is a good thing!
content.summary: Sphere chased by police helicopter near edison electrical facility.

content.detailedDescription:
At 12:24pm the store owner and i were standing outside of his establishment in poway, ca at the corner of poway and pomerado road. we were talking while facing in a southerly direction. it was a very clear day with no clouds in the sky and a minimal amount of humidity in the atmosphere. as i was speaking to him; i noticed a very bright light appear in the sky. it's brilliance and movement drew my attention immediately. the light was so bright that i knew it wasn't an aircraft or helicopter. it was approximately 12 inches (relative) above the southern horizon. its point of origin was approximately 175 degrees on the compass. it was traveling at an undetermined, but very high rate of speed. from the point of origin; it was traveling north, north east to a point on the compass that would have ended at approximately 20 degrees. the relative distance that it traveled was approximately two and a half feet from its point of origin. it covered this distance in approximately ten seconds. 

approximately 3 minutes after the object disappeared two f/18's traveling from the north east came to the point where the object disappeared. they circled this area once then continued south west. thirty seconds later a third "trailer" f/18 came from the same direction and loitered over the area where the ufo had been for approximately 3 minutes. it then egressed to the south west as well. the flight patterns of any aircraft either landing or taking off from miramar air base is well known, as are the flight paths of aircraft that are in the area while performing carrier landings, touch and go exercises, or mutual support missions in this area. the flight path of the three f/18's was well out of normal parameters. as the f/18's approached the area where the object had been they slowed dramatically (no more than 300 knots).These factors, coupled with the fact that their flight path would have put them in direct "head on" contact with the object as they flew south west and it traveled north east, gave the impression that they were not only looking for what i had seen but had been on an intercept coarse. the owner of the establishment also saw the object and the f/18's but without his permission i did not want to include his information.

the object was a brilliant oval shaped light. as it traveled north east it grew in size. when i first saw the object it was approximately five centimeters across. it had increased to approximately 12 centimeters before it disappeared. it's change in distance to me as well as it motion makes it highly improbable that it was reflected light. the light was not only brilliant but constant and did not shimmer or shake. there were no visible anti collision lights of any pattern including red or green. in fact the light from the sun was so bright that the anti collision lights from the f/18's were not visible either. the object made no sound, left no vapor or exhaust trail, and if it's rate of travel was above 620 mph it made no sonic boom. after several second of observing the object i got an uneasy feeling. i would not describe it as fear but unrest as my mind went through the possible causes of the light and continued to fail to come up with a reasonable explanation. the individual that i was with was equally disturbed. i saw the object first but after i pointed it out to him he couldn't take his eye's off of it. it was not exhibiting non-ballistic motion or any other flight characteristic, other than its speed and brilliance, that appeared to be abnormal. i did not have a camera on my person and the event would not have shown up on the phone/camera of my motorola razor. if you have any further questions please feel free to contact me.
content.summary: A brilliant oval shaped light was seen traveling from the south to north east at a high rate of speed followed by f/18's.

content.detailedDescription:
Monday night at exactly nine pm i was getting into my car and happened to look at the north eastern sky at the same time and saw an odd blinking red and white light on what i thought was airplane moving from the northwest towards the east. it appeared odd to me as the lights blinked more often than that of a normal plane and the way the way it flew in what i perceived as being in very quick spurts made me watch it for a few seconds. as i was watching another set of  blinking lights appeared to the right and pretty darn close to the first plane. i then looked at the first plane again and thought the planes were heading toward each other and i was hoping they were just playing games and would not crash in mid-air.  then all of a sudden the first plane, the one of the left, disappeared and reappeared to the second plane's right and seconds later approximately 10 little red/pink balls strung out horizontally and then quickly disappeared. i dont remember looking for the planes after the light display.

just before the second plane appeared i was able to make out a shape for the first plane. i can best describe it as a right angle, meaning it was missing a wing and tail and it's body and only wing were of equal size and length. i dont recall hardly any details about the second plane. i only noticed its lights.

answer to number 5: when i saw the first plane disappear i was very excited and hoping i was watching ufos. when the pinkish red lights appeared i was juggling my phone in my hand trying to get the camera working but i was way too excited to think how to get it to operate. i wasnt scared but i was disappointed after my sighting because more than likely what i saw was a military exercise.
content.summary: Odd flashing lights and odd planes disappearing and leaving behind a horizontal row of pinkish redish lights.

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i were having a cigarette out on our patio at about 9:45 pm in indio, near palm springs, california on march 25, 2009.  i was looking at the stars, as i always do, when i saw a wierd pulsating orb-like light in the eastern sky, out towards the salton sea.  i watched it for awhile before asking my husband to take a look.  we both observed a pulsating pale-white light just hovering.  suddenly, the object brightened, did a couple of rapid crazy figure eight manuevers which made us wonder what the hell it was.  it then pulsated faintly and slowly drifted off to the east.  my husband went in to go to bed and  i observed the faint pulsating light for another ten minutes or so and then it was gone.
     my husband and i were baffled.   we tried to logically explain what we had just seen, but couldn't. we ruled out a star, planet, meteor, airplane, helicopter, blimp, spotlight, and laser.  it made us a bit uncomfortable not being able to identify what we had seen. we would like to know if anyone else saw it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Pulsating pale white orb-like object hovered then brightened, did some rapid crazy figure eight  manuevers. then hovered again only to drift away slowly towards east.

content.detailedDescription: At 5:30am today ,i woke for some unknown reason,i was feeling kindof tingly.I didn't hear anything going on ,no dogs,airplanes,etc. all was quiet,so i decided to get up and go to the bathroom ans as i slid out of my bed i looked out the window in front of me and that's when i saw it! a red flickering v shape,the whole v was lit w/red flickering lights,i rubbed my eyes to see more clearly and it was the same thing .It was so close in the neighbors yard that from it's distance was the size of a good 5 inches across,and it was hovering stationary. i went to get my binoculars and glasses,when i got back ,i couldn't find it,then it flickered again a little further over in the neighbors yard,i tried to see it in binocs. but it was too late,or the buildings outside were blocking my view...I couldn't see it anymore.So i stood there a min. or two longer and went back to bed. maybe next time....
content.summary: Woke for unknown reason, looked out window in front of me...There it was!

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on hwy 8 approx. 12-15kms outside of miramichi city, nb canada. i was driving a transport truck returning home from maine, usa i was the only truck on the road at 330 am on june 17th 1997 when this ship came up from behind me and flew over top of the truck just ahead of me. i checked all around to be sure i was not seeing things i wasn't. the ship was as wide as the two lane hwy. it was mostly the color of mercury with red neon in the middle and almost shaped like a football but as it got near the rear it turned into two points with the red neon in the center. the ship appeared to have its own light source or appeared to give a light that didnt shine it was as if it was its own light. this lasted approx. 3-5 mins and at one point the ship banked up towards the sky at about 45 degree angle and in the blink of an eye i could hardly see it anymore and then it was gone.
content.summary: Very large semi football shaped ship with the outside edges looked like mercury and the inside neon red.

content.detailedDescription:
I diddnt actualy see the ufo till i devolped the pic.Im just wanting to get the pic examined from u guys thanks
                               terry graves ,a believer.
content.summary: Was takeing pic of the sunrise and this is what came up in the pic.

content.detailedDescription:

thanks,

cesar j. reategui

s��� somos vuestros hermanos gu���as en misi���n.
sabemos qui���nes son ustedes, de d���nde han venido, porque est���n aqu���, lo que se espera de ustedes y d���nde se encuentran en ���ste momento.
nuestra labor es apoyarles y guiarles a como de lugar, brind���ndoles las herramientas que puedan usar y que sepan aplicar entre ustedes, con la humanidad y con el planeta. las herramientas son variadas, como variadas son las posibilidades y oportunidades que se les ir���n presentando a cada paso.
esta noche a las 9.30 p.M.  apoyaremos vuestro compromiso y entrega con los cristales de cesio, haci���ndolos llegar entre los que no los tienen a���n. cristales que son potenciadores de vuestra realidad interior, s���mbolos de perfecci���n y llaves de conexi���n con la cuarta dimensi���n. 
sobre la pregunta que  nos hacen  sobre la posibilidad   de que periodistas asistan a un nuevo encuentro programado, les decimos que estos los pueden acompa���ar nuevamente a chilca (per���). bien saben que la misi���n es una unidad, y lo que fue ���til y necesario al principio, lo sigue siendo ahora. todo tiene su tiempo y su momento, y ���ste es uno de ellos. que los acompa���en el 30 y el 31 de marzo, all��� donde empez��� todo, para que algo nuevo empiece ahora. 
recuerden que nuestro apoyo viene de m���s all��� del tiempo. somos uno con ustedes. estamos integrados en un mismo proceso, en un mismo desenlace, en un solo resultado posible, en una sola perspectiva futura. nos necesitamos mutuamente; ustedes para  continuar, nosotros para tener un nuevo comienzo. y es que el disc���pulo pas��� a ser maestro, y el maestro disc���pulo, invirti���ndose los roles para garantizar la prueba de humildad en el proceso de ascenso. vuestra din���mica y esfuerzo supone para nosotros nuevas posibilidades impensadas anteriormente, pero que vienen acompa���ados de emociones y paz interna, todo aquello imprescindible para salir del estancamiento motiv���ndonos a asumir los riesgos, y dar el paso definitivo que nos corresponde.
a pedido de ustedes esta misma noche asistiremos al hermano jos��� (del grupo de olmu���) que requiere de una sensible ayuda en cuanto a su salud.
los grupos en chile tendr���n un encuentro en el a���o 2010, como tambi���n apoyaremos el encuentro del paraguay. pasen la voz, que gire el llamado, que llegue  a los corazones y mentes de aquellos sensibilizados para este tiempo para que sean encendidos en una sola respuesta nuevamente. 
en la monta���a les espera la presencia del maestro. lo sentir���n, as��� como la orientaci���n de la hermandad blanca presente en la zona.
no teman nada frente a los acontecimientos mundiales actuales y venideros, porque vuestra preparaci���n es la suma de un crecimiento que viene de antes, y que esta siendo activado a un ritmo acelerado. m���s bien ���nanse en prop���sito, fortal���zcanse en com���n unidad para resistir y mantenerse firmes. falta poco para completar y concretar.
esto les decimos:
���el primer error del presidente (barack obama), ser��� la se���al de su primera correcci���n, y as��� con cada una de sus decisiones, apart���ndose cada vez m���s de la oscuridad que lo quiso manipular. y ser��� con el apoyo de todos a la distancia.
f���jense tambi���n en lo que ella, su esposa (michelle) har���, dir��� y conmover������.  

su entrega los llev��� a la puerta de los retiros de la hermandad blanca, su constancia los abri���, su preparaci���n les permiti��� ver dentro, y vuestro amor con convicci���n extender��� ahora el conocimiento, la luz y todo cuanto all��� ha sido despertado para la humanidad y la comunidad universal.
con amor sampiac.
content.summary: Meet us on the 30th and 31st of march, there where everything started (chilca, peru), for something new to begin now.

content.detailedDescription:
Where:
we lived in an a condo in keauhoa, hawaii - counrty club villas -from 5/07 to 3/08. condo had sliding doors that opened onto a golf course and we could see the sea from there.(very near the sheraton resort.) we lived on the second floor and kept the windows uncovered the entire time we lived there.  
nothing was seen until the fall and winter months.  on 11/19/07 around 2:30 am i got up to go to the bathroom.  i always looked out to see the stars since the skies are so beautiful in hi.  i saw a very very bright light in the sky and started to watch it. the lights were pulsating in a rotating like pattern.  colors were: red, green, a yellow/orange and white.  it was stationary in the sky for up to an hour and then with binoculars (field 7.1 7x50) i watched it go start out into space (hard to articulate exactly) until the light became small and disappeared.  my husband saw it too. i knew immediately we had seen a ufo. i was excited, thrilled and a bit scared.
this did not happen only once...It happened multiple times. i keep the dates because i knew i was seeing something very different.
the following are a list of dates:  11/19, 11/27,12/22,12/28 of 07.  then 3/1 and 3/3 of 08.  we moved back to the mainland later that month. 

location in sky:
from our condo it appeared to be off kealakekua bay area (captain cook)on the south kona coast.  always in that general area give or take.  can not guess it's size or how high off the water it was because it was dark. but times varied.  it would show up around 9:-10:00pm, but usually between 3:00am and 5:30am stayed in the sky for at least an hour. i had a guest at xmas time and she saw it at varies times also.

two other sightings to tell you about.
on saturday 1/12/08 at 9:00pm i was flying out of honolulu back to kona and over honolulu (on the take off climb)i saw the same flashing lights on what appearsed to be a disk with a dome on it, but the body of the thing almost looked translucent.  it was titled toward the earth.  i only saw it a few seconds as the plane was moving and out of my window seat view. 

also i do want to say that on the weekend of march dates the sky had a lot of energy and many lights in it. around 9:00pm.Lots of movement.  lights in the shape of triangles, as w;; as round very bright balls-- these lights would disappear and then reappear.  you could feel the energy that night.  about 2 weeks later the volcano made a dramatic eruption.  

every time we saw the ufos it was either or close to a full moom and i wondered about that.

when i would tell people what i saw they said people in hi often see them. there are a lot of different folks there so i took it with a grain of salt but i do know what we saw. 

i feel better for getting this info out to you. i know what we saw was unique and very interesting.  i have been exact on the locations etc. and i would be interested if others have reported anything from that area. i know i have been changed by my experiences --- in a positive way!
content.summary: Disk-like, rotating flashing colored lights, red, green white yellow-orangeish, very bright in sky.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and my friend recorded this object while driving one night using a cell phone camera. the object was unrecognizable due to it size and brightness. when they brought home the video they showed it to myself, one other friend and my parents. at first we assumed it was a blimp, but we thought it was unusual for a blimp to be entirely lit up, (instead of just the screen being lit up)with no logos/ads on it. the object flies in a straight line at first but at 1:04 in the video, it changes directions, going from flying southeast to directly east with no hesitation. after this occurs the object isnt visible for a brief while because it disappears behind a treeline. at 2:30 the object reappears at a distance, having traveled at a faster rate of speed than before.The video ends due to the ladies having to make a left turn away from the object, heading home. the two young ladies were exstatic over what they had seen while everyone else was in disbelief and offering suggestions as to what it may be. my sister also added that with the naked eye, you could make out the top or dome above the light (like the dome on top of a flying saucer). after more people viewed the video, we narrowed down the object to two possibilities: 1 - some sort of non-advertisment (or maybe weather) blimp thats unnecessarily bright. and 2 - a ufo. not knowing what else to do we posted this video on youtube (titled "ufo? walnut 2009") asking people their thoughts on the subject. a few days later, another youtube user claims to have seen the object later on that night. they claim to have seen the object turn from a white glow to red glow...While rotating. whether this claim is true or not we do not know. on a side note, i recieved another comment on my video by a person living one city east of my hometown. in the daytime they recorded (on an actual video camera, march 23 09) an object either reflecting the sunlight or making its own light. this object is moving erratically within the same parameters over open land, seemily "skipping" like watching an old vhs tape. i just thought i would include this part being as the locations of the two videos are approx. within 15 miles from eachother. any response debunking or accepting this video would be much appreciated.
content.summary: Low flying bright light, unable to debunk.
